dcterms:creator: Thierry Bertin-Mahieux
Daniel P. W. Ellis

dcterms:description: The Million Song Dataset is a large-scale dataset for music information retrieval, containing metadata and audio features for a million songs.
dcterms:title: Million Song Dataset (MSD)

dcterms:description: The AMS is a dataset compiled from the Million Song Dataset with expert annotations of moods from AllMusic.
dcterms:title: AllMusic Mood Subset (AMS)

dcterms:creator: Brian McFee
Thierry Bertin-Mahieux
Daniel P.W. Ellis
Gert R.G. Lanckriet
dcterms:description: The Taste Profile subset from the Million Song Dataset contains listening data and is used for music recommendation and mood classification.
dcterms:title: Taste Profile subset from the Million Song Dataset

dcterms:creator: Erion Ã‡ano
Maurizio Morisio
dcterms:description: The LastFM Set is a dataset created based on Last FM tags for music mood classification.
dcterms:title: LastFM Set

dcterms:description: The 7-digital audio data provides 30s previews as audio data for tracks in the Million Song Dataset.
dcterms:title: 7-digital audio data

dcterms:creator: Mohammad Soleymani
Michael N. Caro
Erik M. Schmidt
Cheng Ya Sha
Yi Hsuan Yang
dcterms:description: 1000 Songs for Emotional Analysis of Music is a dataset designed for analyzing the emotional content of music.
dcterms:title: 1000 Songs for Emotional Analysis of Music
